page.title: 20Finningley,Blaxton-a survey
page.content:
We at Hayfield Lane Junior School did a survey in our area(blocks 7 to 12).
We asked about 90 people to fill in a questionnaire.Here are some of the things we found out:- 1.There were big differences in the length of time people lived in this area.The average length of time that people had lived in Blaxton and Finningley was almost 10 times as long as the service families stayed at R.A.F. Finningley. 2.The things which people like about this area are a)It's a good place for shopping.b)Good access to other places for recreation etc.c)Friendly people. 3.The things which people said they disliked about this area were a)Atmosphere not clean b)Too much litter.c)Aircraft noise.d)Scenery is flat and uninteresting.
